item.description:
Rhode Island Oath Keepers presents...
Special Guest Speaker
David Kopacz, (From Red Pill Politics)
Is Agenda 21 / Sustainable Development Coming to Your Town?

Sonoma Grille
Tuesday May 15th at 7 p.m.
7366 Post Rd, North Kingstown, RI 02852

Environmental special interest groups and regional land use bureaucracies have signifcantly ramped up their efforts to manipulate municipalities into signing onto a variety of detrimental contracts that always result in the stripping of private property rights.

Some warm and fuzzy, but (misleading) names to look out for are:
New Economy
Affordable Housing
Sanctuary
Social Justice
Watershed
Traffic Calming
Best Management Practices
Outcome Based Education
Endangered Species
Invasive Species
Restoration
Public/Private Partnerships
Common Good
Regional
Collaborative
Stakeholder
Historic Preservation
Livable Communities

 

Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting Every third Tuesday of the month @ 7 p.m. Sonoma Grille, 7366 Post Rd, North Kingstown, RI 02852 401-295-0800  tell a friend.  Go to: "Rhode Island Oath Keepers" on facebook or oathkeepers.org for more info. "Yours in Liberty" Randy Swanson 401-952-5015
item.name: Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting
